  Class java.Nutmeg.NArray



java.lang.Object
   |
   +----java.Nutmeg.Collection
           |
           +----java.Nutmeg.IndexedCollection
                   |
                   +----java.Nutmeg.NArray






  
 public class NArray
  
 extends IndexedCollection


Copyright (c) 1995, 1996 THOUGHT Inc. All Rights Reserved.

NArray class (a growable array).

An IndexedCollection sub class which is indexable, both by using the object
as a key, and by the location in the collection.





  




  
 
	NArray(int, int)
  
 Constructor for NArray with an initial storage capacity
and a specified growSize.
  
 
	NArray(int)
  
 Constructs an empty NArray with the specified storage 
capacity, and a default capacity increment.
  
 
	NArray()
  
 Construct an empty NArray.




  




  
 
	clone()
  
 Clone this NArray.





  




NArray

  public NArray(int initialSize,
                int growSize)




  
 Constructor for NArray with an initial storage capacity
and a specified growSize.
  

    
 Parameters:
    
 initialSize - initial storage capacity of data storage
    
 growSize - the increment that storage should grow by
size doubles if value is 0.
  




NArray

  public NArray(int initialSize)




  
 Constructs an empty NArray with the specified storage 
capacity, and a default capacity increment.  Capacity increment 
is defaulted to 0 using this constructor.
  

    
 Parameters:
    
 initialSize - initial storage capacity of data storage.
  




NArray

  public NArray()




  
 Construct an empty NArray.  This defaults to an initial 
storage capacity of 10 objects, and a growSize of 0.





  



clone

  public synchronized Object clone()




  
 Clone this NArray. The objects are not cloned.
  

    
 Overrides:
    
 clone in class IndexedCollection
